name: Spy Slots
description:
Download now! You’ll be one of the first few players in the world to experience this brand new FREE-to-play secret agent casino game!

In addition to playing video slot machines, you will act as a special agent to uncover a thrilling conspiracy step by step, escape from deadly traps, and fight various enemies and terrorists.

As a traditional slot machine game, Spy Slots gives you the chance to WIN BIG in various slot machines with gorgeous graphics! With huge payouts and extraordinary game design, you are guaranteed NEVER to be short on chips!

Go on an adventure like a top secret agent in our original casino game! In Las Vegas, you will search for clues in an effort to reveal an astonishing truth, fight with fully armed mafia gunmen, and head to the Middle East and Tokyo to hunt down terrorists. Are you brave enough to be the protector of our free world?!

TOP FEATURES:

• Exciting slot machines with FREE SPINS and Bonus Games!
• Play through a spectacular story you won’t find anywhere else!
• Uncle Sam insurance plan will guarantee you never run out of chips!
• Daily FREE games and bonuses could win you up to 10,000,000 FREE chips just for logging in!
• Timer Bonus will give out free chips and gems every few minutes!

This game is intended for an adult audience and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
